name: Missionary

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in all Dungeons by 33%

skills.name: Crashing Helberd
skills.raw_description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn

skills.name: In the Thick
skills.raw_description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 100% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn if this Champion's current HP is higher than the target's current HP

skills.name: Humble the Faithless
skills.raw_description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns. Also has 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns

faction.name: Sacred Order
faction.default_description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 49 champions

seo.description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 47 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: For centuries the Knights of the Sacred Order were charged with cleansing Teleria of evil in all its guises. But since the declaration of war, they have sworn allegiance to the Queen of Aravia. In league with the Queen's Necromancer, these once-holy knights now enforce her Majesty's will and guard her chattel.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Missionary is a epic hp champion from the faction Sacred Order doing force damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Sacred Order, Missionary is a champion of Epic rarity and of HP type
structured_data.name: Missionary

default_description: Missionary is a epic hp champion from the faction Sacred Order doing force damage
lore:
Though Lumaya is worshipped far and wide across Teleria, but there are still multiple beings who live not knowing her light or her love. So many live in ignorance, venerating mere spirits and false prophets. Or worse, suffer in the yoke of Siroth. There is only one way to liberate them - through the Words of Lumaya. Many brave men and women of the Sacred Order volunteer to undertake long pilgrimages to the farthest corners of the world, spreading the one true faith where only darkness and foolish superstition dwelled before. They must be charismatic, well-spoken, and learned above all.
But while there are poor souls yearning for guidance out in the world, there are also evil men, those who would knowingly lie to the naive and the ignorant. For the sake of power, wealth, or some darker design. They would oppose the Faithful at every turn, if they could. Which is why every Missionary must be a warrior as well as a preacher. Oftentimes, the most efficient way to sway a more primitive culture to their side is to defeat their false Champions. Thus the Missionaries are good at delivering debilitating blows or provoking their foes with words of truth and wisdom - allowing their allies to do the rest.
